title: Retrieve self assessment tax calculation messages
description: Retrieve self assessment tax calculation messages

summary.title: summary
summary.description: Details of allowances, deductions and reliefs used in the calculation.

totalAllowancesAndDeductions.title: totalAllowancesAndDeductions
totalAllowancesAndDeductions.description: The total allowances and deductions used in the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalReliefs.title: totalReliefs
totalReliefs.description: The total reliefs used in the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

detail.title: details
detail.description: Details the breakdown of allowances, deductions and reliefs used in the calculation.

allowancesAndDeductions.title: allowancesAndDeductions
allowancesAndDeductions.description: Details allowances and deductions used in the calculation.

personalAllowance.title: personalAllowance
personalAllowance.description: The personal allowance available for the tax year. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

reducedPersonalAllowance.title: reducedPersonalAllowance
reducedPersonalAllowance.description: The amount that the personal allowance has been reduced to. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

giftOfInvestmentsAndPropertyToCharity.title: giftOfInvestmentsAndPropertyToCharity
giftOfInvestmentsAndPropertyToCharity.description: Investments and/or property gifts made to charity. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

blindPersonsAllowance.title: blindPersonsAllowance
blindPersonsAllowance.description: Blind persons allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossesAppliedToGeneralIncome.title: lossesAppliedToGeneralIncome
lossesAppliedToGeneralIncome.description: Losses that have been applied to general income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

cgtLossSetAgainstInYearGeneralIncome.title: cgtLossSetAgainstInYearGeneralIncome
cgtLossSetAgainstInYearGeneralIncome.description: CGT losses that have been applied to general income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

qualifyingLoanInterestFromInvestments.title: qualifyingLoanInterestFromInvestments
qualifyingLoanInterestFromInvestments.description: Qualifying loan interest payments made. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

postCessationTradeReceipts.title: postCessationTradeReceipts
postCessationTradeReceipts.description: Trade reliefs and other losses post cessation of a business. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

paymentsToTradeUnionsForDeathBenefits.title: paymentsToTradeUnionsForDeathBenefits
paymentsToTradeUnionsForDeathBenefits.description: Payments made to a Trade union or friendly society for death benefits. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

annualPayments.title: annualPayments
annualPayments.description: Details of any annual payments made.

grossAnnualPayments.title: grossAnnualPayments
grossAnnualPayments.description: The gross value of annual payments made. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

reliefClaimed.title: reliefClaimed
reliefClaimed.description: The value of annual payments made. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

rate.title: rate
rate.description: The tax rate used in the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

pensionContributions.title: pensionContributions
pensionContributions.description: Details of any pension contributions made.

totalPensionContributions.title: totalPensionContributions
totalPensionContributions.description: The value of pension contributions made. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

retirementAnnuityPayments.title: retirementAnnuityPayments
retirementAnnuityPayments.description: The value of retirement annuity payments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

paymentToEmployersSchemeNoTaxRelief.title: paymentToEmployersSchemeNoTaxRelief
paymentToEmployersSchemeNoTaxRelief.description: Payments to employers pension scheme with no tax relief. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

overseasPensionSchemeContributions.title: overseasPensionSchemeContributions
overseasPensionSchemeContributions.description: The value of contributions to an overseas pension scheme. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

reliefs.description: Details the reliefs used in the calculation.

residentialFinanceCosts.title: residentialFinanceCosts
residentialFinanceCosts.description: Details the total residential finance cost reliefs used in the calculation.

adjustedTotalIncome.title: adjustedTotalIncome
adjustedTotalIncome.description: The income (after losses and reliefs, and excluding savings and dividends income) that exceeds your personal allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAllowableAmount.title: totalAllowableAmount
totalAllowableAmount.description: The total allowable amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

relievableAmount.title: relievableAmount
relievableAmount.description: The lower of either Adjusted Total Income or Total Allowable Amount. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

rate.description: The tax rate used in the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalResidentialFinanceCostsRelief.title: totalResidentialFinanceCostsRelief

carryForwardAmount.title: carryForwardAmount
carryForwardAmount.description: The amount of residential finance costs that can be carried forward to future tax years. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
